casebody.data:
ALLSCRIPTS HEALTHCARE, LLC
v.
ETRANSMEDIA TECHNOLOGY, INC. 330A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 20, 2017 Shannon R. Joseph, Attorney at Law, John T. Kivus, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Christopher Jackson, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Allscripts Healthcare, LLC. Tracie H. Brisson, Attorney at Law, for Etransmedia Technology, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th of April 2017 by Plaintiff to Withdraw Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of April 2017."
